fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
meetings with European Commission 
Cabinet of Commissioner Moedas 
Research, Science & Innovation and other commisions
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
ESWRA's vision is to strengthen the development, practice and use of social work research to enhance knowledge about individual and social problems, and to promote just and equitable societies by: 
> Speaking up for and about, social work research with European policy makers 
> Enabling social work researchers to network and collaborate on innovation, funding and research issues. 
> Driving the development of quality research methodology through activities such as training events and Special Interest Groups 
>Sharing European research news and information so he ESWRA Members can keep up-to-date. 
> connecting with the EC and other associations to promote social work research. 
> An annual conference where researchers can debate and critique the latest research and innovation from across Europe.
